summary: Completed frontend testing of enhanced DynoPay checkout page with context-aware features, translations, and UI components

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about invalid DOM properties (fill-rule should be fillRule, clip-rule should be clipRule)

passed_tests: Checkout page loads without errors on /pay (fallback state)
French translations contain all new keys and display correctly
Security badge has data-testid='security-badge' with correct text
Crypto payment button has data-testid='crypto-payment-btn' and is clickable
Enhanced checkout features display correctly (fee breakdown, currency selector, transaction ID)
Fallback message displays when no valid payment link provided
French localization works correctly with proper translations
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Fix SVG icon DOM property warnings (fill-rule -> fillRule, clip-rule -> clipRule) in icon components for cleaner console output
